class.name: MCRCategoryLink
class.query: SELECT cat.rootID, cat.categID, count(*) FROM MCRCategoryImpl cat, MCRCategoryLink link WHERE (cat.rootID=:classID AND cat.internalID = link.category) group by cat.rootID, cat.categID

SELECT cat.rootID, cat.categID, count(*) FROM MCRCategoryImpl cat, MCRCategoryLink link WHERE (cat.rootID=:classID AND link.objectReference.type=:type AND cat.internalID = link.category) group by cat.rootID, cat.categID
DELETE FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE objectReference.objectID IN (:ids)
SELECT objectReference.objectID FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE category.rootID=:rootID and category.categID=:categID
SELECT objectReference.objectID FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE category.rootID=:rootID and category.categID=:categID and objectReference.type=:type
SELECT category.rootID, category.categID FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE objectReference.objectID=:id
SELECT 'true' FROM MCRCategoryLink WHERE category.internalID IN (:internalIDs)
